trans-unit.source: Contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> for each property that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports.
trans-unit.target: 包含<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>每个属性，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]支持。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ships with pre-defined <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> objects for properties that are commonly collected by a stylus and a digitizer.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附带了预定义<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>通常由触笔与数字化器收集的属性的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>

trans-unit.source: You can use these built-in properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用这些内置属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Represents the angle between the axis of the pen and the surface of the Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: 表示的轴的笔和平板电脑的图面之间的角度。

trans-unit.source: The value of AltitudeOrientation is 0 when the pen is parallel to the surface and 90 when the pen is perpendicular to the surface.
trans-unit.target: 笔垂直到图面时，触笔时相似的面和 90，AltitudeOrientation 的值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The values are negative when the pen is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 反转触笔时，这些值为负数。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the clockwise rotation of the cursor, through a full circular range around the z-axis.
trans-unit.target: 表示光标，通过围绕 z 轴完整循环范围顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the barrel button of a stylus.
trans-unit.target: 表示触笔的桶形按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the pressure on a pressure-sensitive button.
trans-unit.target: 表示区分压力的按钮上的压力。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the height of the contact point on the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 表示数字化仪上的联系点的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used.
trans-unit.target: 联系点的高度依赖于使用的检测的类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of Height can vary when Touch is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用触摸设备时，可能会不同高度值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the pressure of the pen tip perpendicular to the Tablet PC surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示与 Tablet PC 图面垂直笔尖的压力。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the current status of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 表示光标的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of the PacketStatus field contains one or more of the following flag values in a bit field.
trans-unit.target: PacketStatus 字段的值包含一个或多个位域中的以下标志值。

trans-unit.source: Use bit operators to check the status of these values.
trans-unit.target: 使用位运算符来检查这些值的状态。

trans-unit.source: - The cursor is touching the drawing surface (Value = 1).
trans-unit.target: -光标正在触及的绘图图面的 (值 = 1)。

trans-unit.source: - The cursor is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 的反转光标。

trans-unit.source: For example, the eraser end of the pen is pointing toward the surface (Value = 2).
trans-unit.target: 例如，橡皮擦结束的笔指向图面 (值 = 2)。

trans-unit.source: - Not used (Value = 4).
trans-unit.target: -不使用 (值 = 4)。

trans-unit.source: - The barrel button is pressed (Value = 8).
trans-unit.target: 的按下桶形按钮 (值 = 8)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents whether the tip is above or below a horizontal line that is perpendicular to the writing surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否提示是高于还是低于条水平线，用于垂直书写表面。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 这要求三维数字化仪。

trans-unit.source: The value is positive if the tip is above the line and negative if it is below the line.
trans-unit.target: 值是如果提示高于行正值和负值如果它低于行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, the pitch is positive if the tip is above a line extending from you to the wall.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您保存面前的笔和假想的墙上写入，音调为正如果提示位于你将扩展到墙上插座线上方。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the clockwise rotation of the pen around its own axis.
trans-unit.target: 表示围绕其自己的轴的笔顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 这要求三维数字化仪。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
